org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql
Class SqlNode

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.SqlNode

public class SqlNode
extends java.lang.Object

Sql result node. A sql node is used to map a result using multilevel strategy.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
